art

Class DTrackBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • art.DTrackBody

  • public class DTrackBody
extends java.lang.Object
    Standard body data (6DOF).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DTrackBody(int id)
      Constructor for not tracked standard body.
      protected DTrackBody(int id, double quality, double[] loc, double[][] rot)
      Constructor for tracked standard body (only pose).

      • DTrackBody

        Constructor for not tracked standard body.

      • DTrackBody

        protected DTrackBody(int id,
                     double quality,
                     double[] loc,
                     double[][] rot)
        Constructor for tracked standard body (only pose).
        Parameters:
        id - ID number (starting with 0)
        quality - Quality (0 ≤ qu ≤ 1, no tracking if -1)
        loc - Location (in [mm])
        rot - Rotation matrix (3x3-dimensional)

        Returns if body is currently tracked.

        public double[][] getRot()
        Returns orientation.
        Returns:
        Rotation matrix (3x3-dimensional)

      • getCov

        public double[][] getCov()
        Returns covariance matrix, if available.
        Returns:
        6x6-dimensional covariance matrix for the 6DOF pose (with 3DOF location in [mm], 3DOF euler angles in [rad])

      • getCovref

        public double[] getCovref()
        Returns reference point of covariance, if available.
        Returns:
        Reference point of covariance (in [mm])

      • setNotTracked

        protected void setNotTracked()
        Set to 'not tracked'.

      • setCov

        protected void setCov(double[][] cov,
                      double[] covref)
        Set covariance data.
        Parameters:
        cov - 6x6-dimensional covariance matrix for the 6DOF pose (with 3DOF location in [mm], 3DOF euler angles in [rad])
        covref - Reference point of covariance (in [mm])
